https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cD4uQM8oF2oEEn2mMuaImVvGkto.jpg Founded by the power couple, Ali and Sofia Khan, The Light is a training center that claims to be a self-betterment organization, focused on helping youths take charge of their life for a brighter future. But when three best friends join this organization, they soon realize that dark shadows lurk behind The Light and must find a way to escape. A World Without
